abstract: Adam Bryant Corner Office column features interview with Xerox unit ACS president and chief executive officer Lynn Blodgett discussing his management style.
snippet: Lynn Blodgett of ACS, a unit of Xerox, says that even in huge organizations, employees at all levels should feel “accountable for profits, revenue and customer satisfaction.”
lead_paragraph: Lynn Blodgett of ACS, a unit of Xerox, says that even in huge organizations, employees at all levels should feel “accountable for profits, revenue and customer satisfaction.”

headline.main: In a Big Company, Make Everyone an Entrepreneur
headline.seo: Lynn Blodgett of ACS, on Entrepreneurship in a Big Company
headline.print_headline: In a Big Company, Make Everyone An Entrepreneur
